text: Corey Scott Feldman (born July 16, 1971) is an American actor and singer. He was born in Los Angeles. He is the singer of the ska band Truth Movement. He first acted when he was 3 years old in a McDonald's advert. He was friends with Michael Jackson. Feldman was a contestant in the first season of The Surreal Life. On October 28, 2013 Coreyography was published. In the book Feldman wrote about how he started taking drugs when he was 14 years old. When he was 17, Joe Dante and Carrie Fisher told him to stop taking drugs. He did not listen to them. ==Movies== * Time After Time (1979) – Boy at Museum * The Fox and the Hound (1981) – Young Copper (voice) * Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter (1984) – Tommy Jarvis *
